text: Super Trucks Racing (or simply as Super Trucks in Europe and Japan) is an racing game developed by Jester Interactive and published by XS Games exclusively on PlayStation 2. All drivers and sponsorship information are based on the 2001`Super Trucks racing series. Category:2002 video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation 2-only games Category:Truck racing video games Category:Video games set in France
title: Super Trucks
